titleStmt.title: The familiar epistles of M.T. Cicero Englished and conferred with the: French Italian and other translations
Epistolae ad familiares. English
titleStmt.author: Cicero, Marcus Tullius.
Webbe, Joseph.

notesStmt.note: The translator's name, I. Webbe, appears in the heading to the dedication.
A translation of: Epistolae ad familiares.
The first two leaves are blank except for signature-marks between rows of type ornaments.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
